short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track all your shows progress across multiple platforms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily track all your favourite shows across all web platforms!

Features:
- Recognizes over 20 000 shows
- Easy adding and removing of tracked shows
- Smart tracking to detect when you're watching tracked shows

Start tracking shows in just 3 steps:
1) Add the shows you want to track
2) Let the smart notification suggest updates 
3) Enjoy!
